mapper.select: SELECT b.bom_code, b.product_code, p.product_name, d.mat_code, m.mat_name, d.need_cnt, d.unit, m.unit_price FROM bom b JOIN bom_detail d ON b.bom_code = d.bom_code JOIN mat m ON m.mat_code = d.mat_code JOIN product p ON p.product_code=b.product_code WHERE b.apply_status = 'BAY' ORDER BY b.bom_code,d.mat_code
SELECT b.bom_code , p.product_code , p.product_name , b.apply_status , b.users_code , b.write_date FROM bom b JOIN product p ON b.product_code = p.product_code
SELECT b.bom_code , p.product_code , p.product_name , b.apply_status , b.users_code , b.write_date FROM bom b JOIN product p ON b.product_code = p.product_code
